# Project Euler 007 - C# Console Application

This is a C# console application designed for solving Project Euler problems, specifically focusing on problem 007.

## Project Structure
- `Program.cs` - Main entry point for the console application
- `projecteuler007.csproj` - Project configuration file
- `README.md` - Project documentation

## Development Guidelines
- Focus on mathematical problem-solving algorithms
- Write clean, efficient C# code
- Include comments explaining mathematical concepts
- Test solutions with provided examples

## Project Euler Problem 007
Find the 10001st prime number.
